said: "I love The Hoff." The first of the judges to arrive was motormouth comic Michael McIntyre , 34, who knew exactly what he was after from the Scottish acts. He said: We've had Subo then we had Janey Cutler. "This year I'm looking for an even older woman. "They are getting older and older. "I'm hoping for a 98-year-old woman to just turn up and blow the roof off the Armadillo. Michael McIntyre and The Hoff took over judges' duties from Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell , who will return for the live TV shows. Also gee-ing up the crowd were pint-sized Geordie presenters Ant and Dec.
